parameter.name: RestrictPermissions
parameter.description: RestrictPermissions (true/false), false leads to a normal, unsecured pdf file

parameter.name: Pdfa
parameter.description: generate a pdfa file (true/false), if true, this will disable all other security options

parameter.name: UsePasswords
parameter.description: 0: don't use passwords/ 1: use permission password only/ 2: use both permission and open file password

parameter.name: OpenFilePassword
parameter.description: set the password to open the pdf file

parameter.name: Printing
parameter.description: Restrict printing: 0: Not permitted / 1: Only Low resolution / 2: Allow High resolution

parameter.name: Changes
parameter.description: Restrict changes: 0: Not permitted / 1: Allow Inserting, deleting and rotating pages / 2: Allow Commenting, filling in form fields / 3: Any except extracting pages
